isis.stitle: HENDRICKSON AIR SUSPENSION WITH TRAILING LEAF SPRINGS - HENDRICKSON AIR SUSPENSION COMPONENTS - CAB AIR RELEASE

svcproc.title: CAB AIR RELEASE
svcproc.para: A pilot valve installed in the cab controls a quick release valve at the rear suspension. This permits the driver to exhaust the rear suspension air for trailer coupling and uncoupling ( Figure 5). For normal operation, the air suspension cab control valve will be in the run position ( Figure 5). To dump the air from the springs, place the valve in the DUMP position. The switch has a guard to prevent an unintentional air dump. DO NOT REMOVE THE GUARD.
The Hendrickson suspension ride height is controlled by a single leveling valve.
